articles.description: In its return to the Big East Tournament — the one with fans — the third-seeded Huskies looked capable of cutting down the nets Saturday night.
articles.content:
Too big. Too strong. Too athletic. Too fresh.
The third meeting between Seton Hall and UConn was no contest, nothing like the far closer first two encounters this season.
In its return to the Big E… [+2645 chars]
